title: Cognitive Load Optimization Strategies Using Concept Mapping

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in creating basic concept maps and foundational knowledge of cognitive load theory
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning requiring simplified visual materials, emphasizing concept-structuring training through real-time interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and construct hierarchical and cross-disciplinary connections in concept maps.
Learners apply cognitive load reduction strategies while structuring complex concepts involving three or more levels.
Learners improve the clarity of concept maps by 80% or more based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
